job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Cloud/Data Engineer you will work on two of our most important tracks:
   Development of a data science platform that other teams can use (based on AzureML) &
   Supporting our data scientists in the development of AI use cases & Experiments.

   You have daily contact with the rest of the team and you like to work in an interdisciplinary environment. We really bring the worlds of Engineering and Data Science together.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Cloud Data Engineer

As a Cloud/Data Engineer you will work on two of our most important tracks:
   Development of a data science platform that other teams can use (based on AzureML) &
   Supporting our data scientists in the development of AI use cases & Experiments.

   You have daily contact with the rest of the team and you like to work in an interdisciplinary environment. We really bring the worlds of Engineering and Data Science together.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on data engineering tasks and supporting data scientists, but does not explicitly mention the development, fine-tuning, or deployment of generative AI models or LLMs, which are core to the GenAI Engineer profile. While it mentions AI use cases, the primary responsibilities lean towards data infrastructure and supporting existing AI development rather than building AI systems themselves. The role is described as 'Senior Cloud Data Engineer', further reinforcing the data engineering focus. Therefore, it does not fit the specific requirements of a GenAI Engineer or ML Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The role is explicitly titled 'Senior Cloud Data Engineer' and mentions working on a 'data science platform' and 'supporting our data scientists', which directly relates to building and maintaining data infrastructure and pipelines.
Developing a platform for other teams to use, especially a 'data science platform', involves building and maintaining data infrastructure and tools.
job_tasks.phrase: Development of a data science platform

job_tasks.justification: The role involves supporting data scientists in developing AI use cases and experiments, which implies involvement in the modeling phase, even if not solely responsible for it.
job_tasks.phrase: Supporting our data scientists in the development of AI use cases & Experiments

job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly stated as building user-facing applications, the development of a 'data science platform that other teams can use' suggests building software components and services that will be consumed by other internal teams.
job_tasks.phrase: Development of a data science platform that other teams can use

job_tasks.justification: The description states 'You have daily contact with the rest of the team and you like to work in an interdisciplinary environment. We really bring the worlds of Engineering and Data Science together.', indicating strong communication and collaboration skills.
job_tasks.phrase: daily contact with the rest of the team and you like to work in an interdisciplinary environment

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'We really bring the worlds of Engineering and Data Science together' highlights the need for collaboration and bridging different technical domains.
job_tasks.phrase: bring the worlds of Engineering and Data Science together

soft_skills.phrase: daily contact with the rest of the team and you like to work in an interdisciplinary environment
bring the worlds of Engineering and Data Science together
